product_details.name: Campus DECCAN Men's Lace-Up Walking Shoes
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 30.5 x 21.5 x 11.2 cm; 900 g. Country of Origin: India. Department: mens. Item Weight: 900 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 30.5 x 21.5 x 11.2 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Pair. Generic Name: Sports Shoes. Customer Reviews: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 155 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a promotional design for a pair of athletic men's walking shoes. The background features a sleek dark theme with curved wave elements and semi-transparent circular accents for visual depth. On top, a bold all-caps headline (text id: "heading") draws attention, followed by a subheadline (text id: "subheading") in a vibrant blue tone that reinforces the product category. Centered in the design is a product image (id: "product_image"), prominently displayed for visual appeal. Lower in the frame, the price (text id: "price") is positioned in large, bold format for clarity. At the bottom, a red action button (rect id: "cta_background") with white call-to-action text (id: "cta") invites interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Slate: `#1A1A1A`
- Deep Navy: `#0D1A26`
- Electric Blue: `#3498DB`, `#2980B9`
- Bright Red: `#E74C3C`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a modern black athletic shoe with a sleek, sporty aesthetic. Dominant black mesh and synthetic overlays (#121212) serve as a bold base, giving the shoe a rugged and versatile look. Subtle graphite grey accents (#4C4C4C) are used in stripes and overlays, blending seamlessly with the black while adding depth. Pops of electric red (#FF3B30) near the lacing area create visual interest, while the vibrant blue (#007BFF) highlights branding and heel tab for contrast. Soft midsole reflections in dark navy (#1A1A2E) and a hint of yellow gold (#FFD700) in the “PILOT” logo enhance the design’s premium appeal.
